title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish requirements for the
operation of all day placement programs. Such programs shall be alternatives to
traditional institutional placement for eligible youth who do not require
institutional confinement for all or part of their placement with the
division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
178.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
